package testing;

import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.Set;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.WindowType;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select;

public class WindowHanling {

	private static WebElement staticDropdown;

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		
		ChromeDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		driver.get("https://www.google.com");
		driver.get("https://rahulshettyacademy.com/practice");
		driver.switchTo().newWindow(WindowType.TAB);
		
	          Set <String> handles=  driver.getWindowHandles();
	          Iterator<String> it =  handles.iterator();
	          String parentwindow =  it.next();
	          String childwindow = it.next();
	          driver.switchTo().window(childwindow);
	          driver.get("https://rahulshettyacademy.com/angularpractice/");
	          System.out.println (driver.getCurrentUrl());
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[name='name']")).sendKeys("Pratima");
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[name='email']")).sendKeys("test@123@gmail.com");
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[placeholder='Password']")).sendKeys("Sel123");
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[type='checkbox']")).click();
	          // System.out.println( driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[type=['checkbox']")).isSelected());
	          
	          WebElement Staticdropdown = driver.findElement(By.id("exampleFormControlSelect1"));
	          Select dropdown = new Select(Staticdropdown);
	          dropdown.selectByIndex(1);
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[value='option2']")).click();
	          driver.findElement(By.cssSelector("input[class='form-control']")).click();
	          
	          //driver.findElement(By.id("inlineRadio1")).click();

	          ////driver.findElement(By.name("bday")).sendKeys("02/02/1992");

	         // driver.findElement(By.cssSelector(".btn-success")).click();

	          //System.out.println(driver.findElement(By.cssSelector(".alert-success")).getText());

	          
	      
	}

}
